divs: Sighting DetailsI realize this has taken a little while to subit and may not be worthinvestigating but am sure of what I observed.I was working the night shift andhad stepped outside for a breath of fresh air.The facility where I worked at wasqueit a large complex on the Chattahoochee river in the Jones Bridge park areaof city mentioned above.It was a clear morning and there were stars in thesky,but these 2 pinpoints of light appeared out of the east traveling at a highspeed and vanished.Approximatly one minute later they reappeared from samedirection and again vanished.I did not see them again but shortly afterwardapproximatly 3 minutes,I observed an aircraft,flying paralell in the oppositedirection of where objector objects,the lights were in perfect formation so itwas difficult to tell if they were 2 or 1appeared.I found this to be strange forthe reason that this occured shortly after the Sept 11 skyjackings and allgeneral and commercial aviation flights were put on hold at that time and alsothe high speed and perfect precision these objects flew.Again this may benothing due to the time I took to tell about it and there may be a perfectlylogical explaination for it ,but thought it may be interesting.Thanks for yourtime.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Norcross
There were no other sightings in Norcross on or around September 15th 2001
Summary: This appeared to be the triangle shape
